subject: My Dear Partner,
body:
My Dear Partner,
I'm happy to inform you about my success in getting the fund transferred to the Royal Bank of Scotland Account with the cooperation of a new partner from Paraguay who is an international businessman. Presently I'm in Paraguay for investment projects with my own share of the total sum. Meanwhile, I did not forget your past efforts and attempts to assist me in transferring those funds despite the fact that you failed me somehow.
 
Contact and direct my secretary. Her Name is Miss. Mary Ubah Email:maryuba552@gmail.com  and Ask her to send you an International Bank Check from Royal Bank of Scotland $450.000.00 (Four Hundred and Fifty Thousand US Dollars) which I kept for your compensation for all the past efforts and attempts to assist me in this matter.
 
I appreciate your efforts at that time very much. So, feel free and get in touch with Miss. Mary Ubah and instruct her where to send the amount to you. Please do let me know immediately you receive it so that we can share the joy after all the sufferings at that time. At the moment, I am very busy here because of the investment projects which I'm having with my new partner at hand.
 
Finally, remember that I had forwarded instructions to my secretary on your behalf to receive that money, so feel free to get in touch with her and she will send the amount to you without any delay.
 
With best regards,
Mr. Charles Obasi.
(Sent From Paraguay)

subject: Re:   My Dear Partner,
body:
Dear Mr. Charles Obasi,

Thank you for reaching out to me and sharing this exciting news. I'm glad to hear about your success in getting the funds to the Royal Bank of Scotland Account with the help of your new partner from Paraguay. It must be a great relief for you.

I appreciate that you haven't forgotten my past efforts and attempts to assist you, even though I couldn't fully support you at that time. It's kind of you to remember and acknowledge my willingness to help.

Could you please provide me with more details about how I can contact Miss Mary Ubah? I would like to get in touch with her and discuss the process of receiving the bank check from the Royal Bank of Scotland. Also, could you clarify what exactly this amount is for?

I understand that you are currently busy with investment projects in Paraguay, but it would be wonderful if we could share the joy after all the difficulties we faced before. Once I receive the amount, I will definitely let you know.

Thank you again for considering me for this opportunity, Mr. Charles Obasi.

Best wishes,
James
